name: Fly Bird 2 - Let Me Jump Cross These Target Walls
name_original: Fly Bird 2 - Let Me Jump Cross These Target Walls
description:
Tap the screen to let the bird jump once, and keep tap to make sure it is not falling, or hit the walls.

It is a difficult game than it looks, how many walls can you across.

In this version, some unknown magic things happens, there is more items float in the air, Brick and a amazing coin
1.Life Coin: You will get additional life when you hit this coin.When you failed, you will lose a coin and continue to fly, the score will not return to 0. It help you to get more chance to survival.
2.Bricks: there is also some bricks float in the air, you must be very careful when you fly, hit any of them will also make you failed.
